dialog: I do not seek to lead, but rather to cooperate with all and achieve our task through the collective effort of us all.
Do you think you can communicate effectively in the tongue of English?
Indeed, for the most part.
Are you open to travel?
Aye, I have a fondness for journeys. I am young and unattached, it is of no hindrance for me to traverse frequently.
How long shall it take us to reach London by carriage?
It is my understanding that the distance to London is 180 kilometers from here. At a brisk pace on the highway, the trip should take no more than two hours.
Of course, unless there are delays from heavy traffic. In that case, it may take us three hours.
Indeed, we may travel at a quick pace at the beginning and end of our journey as we navigate through populated areas.
Shall we allow three hours then to account for any unexpected events?
Ah, have you seen the conveyance provided by my employer?
No, let me take a gander... it appears to be longer than my own mode of transportation.
If memory serves, it is over five meters in length. I cannot recall the exact measurement. It is capable of reaching speeds greater than 200 kilometers per hour.
Merlin's beard! That is swift indeed! I highly doubt we shall attain such velocities on the highway.
Indeed, for to do so would be to break the imposed limits on speed.
And how did I fare on my driving exam?
Do you wish to hear the truth?
Of course, I do.
Well, I must say, your performance was not particularly impressive.
How poorly did I fare?
